thread.title: Anthony Davis is Giving Away A Lot of Sneakers
thread.title_full: Anthony Davis is Giving Away A Lot of Sneakers

author: Bobby Reagan
title: Anthony Davis is Giving Away A Lot of Sneakers
text:
Posted in Main | 1 Response @AntDavis23 
Anthony Davis is playing Santa Claus according to his Twitter . Davis tweeted out that he’s giving away a pair of sneakers a day through the month of October – or as he calls it Antober. It’s another great thing a former Cat is doing and while it may not seem like much, just shows you how much Davis loves his fans. 
Now, no word if these are all size 17, but follow Davis on Twitter @AntDavis23 and follow his daily rules to get a chance to win some sneakers. Article written by Bobby Reagan One time representative of UK at SEC 3v3 basketball championships. Northern Yankee living the Kentucky dream. Follow me @uklefty22 One response to “Anthony Davis is Giving Away A Lot of Sneakers” fatbrat October 2, 2015 at 6:14 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I am going to say that Nike is footing the bill on these kicks. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
